code: function readFiles(file,setdata){CSVToJSON(file,setdata);}function CSVToJSON(file,setdata){if(file==null)return{};else{var reader=new FileReader();var text="";reader.onload=function(e){fileToString(e.target.result,setdata);};reader.readAsText(file);return text;}}function fileToString(str,setdata){var rows=str.split("\n");var ans=[];for(var i=0;i<rows.length;i++){var temp=[];var rowData=rows[i].split(",");for(var j=0;j<rowData.length;j++){temp.push(rowData[j]);}ans.push(temp);}setdata(ans);}export default readFiles;
